item.title: Benefits of a Gigabit Ethernet Network Connection
item.description:
The demand for high-capacity internet connections has caught some businesses off guard. What started as a T1 line evolved into a DS3 connection and maybe even an OC3 fiber optic service, but there always seems to be a bottleneck. It might be time to upgrade to Gigabit Ethernet (GigE). It’s important to understand that those older telecom services you’ve been using are based on telephone technology. While they’re dependable, they weren’t designed for today’s network needs...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/benefits-of-a-gigabit-ethernet-network-connection/
